p: We first established the Ebola sGP Detection Kit LOD by serial dilutions of recombinant sGP protein in human plasma ( Fig 1A). The minimal concentration of spiked sGP detected is 7.8 ng/ml (based on a cut off value of delta OD 18), corresponding to 60 pM of protein, representing a low LOD, in agreement with previously reported LOD of silver-enhanced immunochromatography [ 26]. As we only use 140 Î¼l of sample per test, our diagnostic kit detects 1.09 ng of spiked sGP ( Fig 1A).
